bounding-tile.create-already-exists: This bounding tile already exists on this scene.
bounding-tile.not-found: No existing bounding tile. Please create a bounding tile on this scene.

share.scene-success: Media successfully shared on the scene.
share.scene-no-scene: No scene viewed. Please display a scene first.
share.popout-success-all: Media successfully shared to all players.
share.popout-success-some: Media successfully shared to selected players.
share.fullscreen-success-all: Media successfully shared to all players.
share.fullscreen-success-some: Media successfully shared to selected players.

bounding-tile-creation.title: What should this bounding tile be named?
bounding-tile-creation.how-to: Please fill in the bounding tile name field. Bounding tiles on the same scene must have different names.

share-bounding-tile-selection.title: Which bounding tile to display the media?
share-bounding-tile-selection.how-to: Please select the bounding tile that will be used to display the media.

clear-bounding-tile-selection.title: Which bounding tile to clear?
clear-bounding-tile-selection.how-to: Please select the bounding tile that will be cleared.

players-selection.title: Which players should the media be shared with?
players-selection.how-to: Please select the players to whom the media will be shared.
